title: Terraria v1.2.11965 mods + data
description:
DIG! FIGHT! EXPLORE! BUILD! Join the community of millions of Terrarians!

In Terraria, every world is unique -- from the floating islands in the sky to the deepest level of The Underworld. Adventure to the ends of the earth, and battle villainous bosses along the way. The world is your canvas and action-packed, sandbox adventures are just a pickaxe swing away!

*** MULTIPLAYER -- Local WiFi games support up to 4 players cross-platform on any mobile device!
- 1250+ CRAFTING RECIPES - weapons, armor, potions, and more
- 150+ ENEMIES
- 50+ BLOCK TYPES to build anything you can imagine!
- 15+ PETS
- 15+ BOSSES!
- Over a DOZEN environments to explore!
- Dynamic water & lava, day/night cycles!
Every pixel of Terraria has been crafted for the BEST possible mobile experience.

â€œTerraria so damn engrossing. And it makes those comparisons to Minecraft seem a little half baked.â€ Pocket Gamer

"This is the full version of Terraria, built from the ground up... If you loved it on PC or consoles, youâ€™ll love it here." â€“ Slide To Play 

â€œTerraria takes a different approach to a formula proven by Minecraft in perspective, combat, immersive-storytelling and â€“ most importantly â€“ moments of discovery.â€ Touch Arcade 

Whatâ€™s new:
Dig! Fight! and Explore in a more expansive world over 2.5 times the size of what has been available thus far for Mobile Terrarians!
If your device has less than 1GB of memory, you may experience performance issues if you create an Expanded World. The option to create Expanded Worlds is not available on devices with less than 512MB.

Mod Info:
Mod V1: Free Crafting
Mod V2: Invisible & Free Crafting
Mod V3: Invisible

Install APK,Place data folder in SDCard/Android/Obb/ and play
Required Android O/S : 4.0.3+ and 512MB RAM
